name: date
title: Date & Time
text: We kindly ask that guests arrive by 10:30 on Wednesday 16 December 2020

name: venue
title: The Venue
text: The beautiful Graceland Vineyards in the Stellenbosch winelands.  Find more details below.

name: rsvp
title: RSVP
text: Please RSVP by Sunday, 13/12/2020. Guest must please RSVP for the ceremony and lunch, as well as the bonfire.

name: drinks
title: Food & Drink
text: We have a variety of lunch options on the menu so no need to ask for the food preferences.

name: virtual
title: Virtual Ceremony
text: For those who cannot make it in person, we would love to have you join in virtually at 10:30am.

name: wear
title: What To Wear
text: Summery - Smart Casual. Summer hats are encouraged, however parasols will be provided for your enjoyment.
